txt.en: Snow-beasts can be found throughout the Misty Mountains, especially near the source of the Bruinen.\n\nDefeat snow-beasts wherever you encounter them to make the mountain passes safer for those that travel through.

'You have survived the claws of the snow-beasts and returned with a tale to tell, [placeholder]! I am glad to hear it and to tell you that you have performed a great service for those forced to travel into the mountains.'

'Snow-beasts are ferocious creatures that fight with tooth and claw on the high ridges, [placeholder], and they are a grave danger to those forced to travel through the mountains. They must be defeated wherever they are found.'
Snow-beasts can be found throughout the Misty Mountains and are a hazard to any travellers making their way through.

Snow-beasts can be found throughout the Misty Mountains, especially near the source of the Bruinen.\n\nDefeat snow-beasts wherever you encounter them to make the mountain passes safer for those that travel through.

Snow-beasts can be found throughout the Misty Mountains, especially near the source of the Bruinen.\n\nDefeat snow-beasts wherever you encounter them to make the mountain passes safer for those that travel through.
Malthenor of Rivendell has been stationed in the Misty Mountains to keep watch over Gl√≥in's camp.\n\nMalthenor will be pleased to hear that you have defeated many snow-beasts.
